name: Robot Game Show
description:
Hello fellow humans, Watch one human participate in "RobotGameshow" a game show where a human competes against robots by placing cards to redirect overloads to damage their opponents, but the human must be careful with the roulette, it has 4 events that make this gameshow more and more chaotic.

In case you want to participate, use your mouse to place the cards from your deck by clicking on them and then clicking a card on the board, when a "!" appears, an overload will come from that side of the board. The arrows indicate the flow of the electricity.

This game was created by Adam Morton and Erizux for Mini jam 99.

Adam Morton's page: https://adammortonmusic.com/
